Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
Author: Rosy MonarrezRosy Monarrez
Title: 2nd Time I Order 💗
Body: 2nd time I order the same Stanley from this vendor. I reordered because I was so upset I accidentally forgot my first Stanley outside on the bench of my son’s barbershop a month ago before leaving on vacation because I was rushing getting last minute things done. Cup has no damages to it and it arrived 3 days earlier than expected. I’m excited to have my cup back!!! 😃P.S My husband and 2 kids also have Stanley cups for daily use, they bring it to the table every time we sit down to eat, and every time we go out. Helps eliminate half dranked water bottles around the house. Each picked their own color for easy identification.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
Author: Lisa TuckerLisa Tucker
Title: Stanley is awesome
Body: The best part about the Stanley mug is the name. Stanley has always been synonymous with "thermos". Men and women oftern carried their hot soup or coffee to work and it would still be hot at the end of the day. The same confidence is available with the mug. I am not great at getting my daily water quota in. The water sits too long. The ice melts and I am left with tepid water. With this mug, the water is still cold and ice left in the mug 24 hours later. It's amazing. I use it when going on a trip so that I have a nice cold beverage for the entire time.The only negatives are 1. The price. It's a big hefty for 1 mug.2. It can be a bit heavy because of the metal necessary to keep the liquid cold. If you have any arthritis or wrist issues, you may find a smaller version a better fit.Overall, I am extremely happy with the purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
Author: Kyrstin
Title: Don’t buy through Amazon
Body: Just a heads up - these are great but you can find them for 1/2 the price Amazon is selling them for on the Stanley website or at other retailers like REI, it’s ridiculous how much they are marked up on here.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
Author: ShirleyShirley
Title: Cute and does the job!
Body: For $68 bucks - the cup is so adorable and drinking two is more than enough for hydration throughout the day. However, it came with a dent/scratch on the metal rim. I’m very detail oriented so it’s a big irk to me. Difficult to ignore it.

Date: Reviewed in Germany on April 23, 2023
Author: alexaa94alexaa94
Title: Schnell aber leicht beschädigt
Body: Tolles Produkt was auch sehr schnell bei mir war.Leider war es ohne Umverpackung einfach lieblos in einen Karton geworfen 🫠Am Griff sind leider Spuren. Für diesen Preis leider sehr schade!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
Author: MaddieLatz08MaddieLatz08
Title: Better color then I was expecting
Body: Read reviews saying the color was cream with Mocha accents. Mine was. A pale pink with a muted pink accents! Love it so much!! Kinda pricy but it’s gorgeous

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
Author: Kaleigh RittiKaleigh Ritti
Title: cutest color, perfect condition
Body: This was my first Stanley cup. The color is even cuter in person, and it keeps my water cool all day. Great price too, I didn’t have to pay an insane amount since Stanley became so popular

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
Author: Marie
Title: Does not fit in regular sized car cupholders
Body: The cup is very cute, and keeps my drink cold for days at a time. However, it is not the most convenient for students to carry around campus because the handle does not fit into the side pouches of the backpack. I recommend ordering a straw cover because it the straw is very exposed. Overall I would rate it a 7/10, and definitely would recommend others to buy.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on June 2, 2023
Author: Abbie RichardsonAbbie Richardson
Title: Price tag on bottom
Body: I bought this for over $100 Canadian to find an urban outfitters tag on the bottom for $59 CAD.Love the cup but maybe take the real price tag off before sending it out so people don't feel a bit scammed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
Author: SandieSandie
Title: Delivered quickly and in great condition
Body: Packed nicely in a box and shipped quickly. I saw people sharing reviews on other sellers pages saying that the cups they bought were sweating and I was worried there might be fake cups out there. I tested the cup and it didn’t sweat so it’s insulated. Honestly very happy with my purchase I would recommend this seller.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
Author: Stephany santellanoStephany santellano
Title: worth it!
Body: I use this everyday at work!! it’s the cutest baby pink color. holds the perfect amount of water so i dont have to run to the water fountain to refill all day! the handle is the best part because i have small hands to hold a chunky water bottle. i need one in every color!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
Author: Morgan BurgoMorgan Burgo
Title: Buy on Stanley website!
Body: I love it but definitely recommend buying through Stanley’s website. It just comes wrapped in tissue paper. Needs better packaging. The handle had a mark on it. I was able to wash most of it off. Able to hold 2 1/2 water bottles. Love the color. It’s a very light pink color, rose qaurtz.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
Author: AnonymousAnonymousAnonymousAnonymous
Title: Brand New
Body: To be honest, I was a little worried from the reviews seeing how some people received theirs damaged..luckily mine came brand new IN THE STANLEY BOX, so there are no complaints at all. No leak, no scratch, no dent, and I received the exact color I wanted.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
Author: Alma RazoAlma Razo
Title: Color muy lindo
Body: No tenía muchas expectativas con este producto ya que he visto muchas malas reseñas sobre el descascaro de la pintura y problemas con el mango , mi vaso llego en muy buen estado me encanto todo,  rápida entrega y empacado muy bien , mi opinión es que tengas mucho cuidado no todos los productos son genuinos hay muchas copias por aquí fíjate que realmente sea un Stanley real .

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
Author: karenlovesbellabookarenlovesbellaboo
Title: Perfect!
Body: Came in earlier than expected! Item is as expected. So happy I found this coz every other ones I found are so expensive and not sure of the authenticity. This is the real deal! Love my tumbler!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
Author: Amanda S.
Title: My daughter is obsessed with this cup, but it’s not leakproof
Body: My preteen daughter, like many others, is obsessed with her new Stanley cup. It is a very pretty shade of light pink, and seems very sturdy and keeps her ice water cold for a long time. However, for those seriously debating getting this cup, it is HUGE and barely fits in standard cup holders. It does not fit in the side pockets of most backpacks. And it is HEAVY - way heavier than any of the Yetis, Swigs and Corkcicles we own. And it is DEFINITELY not leakproof!!  I’m not sure how you can advertise it as such when it had a straw. My daughter set hers on her bed one time and it fell over and all 40oz of water spilled very quickly onto her bed.  Pretty disappointing for a product from a company that makes camping stuff.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
Author: anne whiteanne white
Title: Damaged
Body: I love the cup itself. However it’s not cheap and for the amount of money I paid for it you think they would package it better. It came in a box too small for it and the straw is completely bent. Do better Stanley.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
Author: NataliaNatalia
Title: Love my new cup!
Body: All though I love my new cup I was sad to find small dents because it was only shipped with tissue paper not very much protection.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
Author: Danielle A.
Title: Not sure but I think mine is defective
Body: After waiting for delayed shipping and for the ridiculous cost to come down, I bought this cup. It arrived in seemingly normal condition but when I went to wash it it became abundantly clear within about 5 seconds the handle was extremely loose.  I tried to tighten it with a hex tool but to no avail. So sad and disappointed and seller doesn’t offer support for this item. If I don’t hear from Stanley soon I will return

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
Author: Ileana Marie
Title: Spills like crazy
Body: This water bottle is popular for a reason! It keeps my drinks cold and helps me drink so much more water than i did before! My only issue is that it isn’t spill proof, one tip over and a ton of water comes out of the straw and the whole top of the lid. Super annoying.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
Author: Bryleigh ThompsonBryleigh Thompson
Title: good
Body: item as described

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
Author: Jeff Kennemer
Title: I e melted in less than 2 hours
Body: Spent almost $80 on this and the ice melted in it the very first use, within two hours. Totally not worth the money.

Title: Love it!
Body: I would highly recommend!

Title: LOVE
Body: I love this cup so much. The pink is my favorite and it holds ice very well plus keeps your drink cold for over 24 hours. The only thing I dislike is the price on it.

Title: Fits my car cup holder!!!
Body: I absolutely love that fits my car cup holder!! Very sturdy! Super super pretty color and design and does keep my water cold for a long time. Also I feel like the wide straw makes me drink more water throughout the day. It was a bit pricey but I can understand since that color is sold out on the Stanley website..

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
Author: At617
Body: Honestly, the cup is worth the hype and especially from this seller. Yes, it’s marked up slightly but worth the extra $20 considering you can’t purchase them anywhere else. The cup came in just under 2 days and in perfect condition. Highly recommend this cup & seller. Thanks!

Title: Handle broke off only 2 months!

Date: Reviewed in Mexico on February 2, 2024
Author: ElenaElena
Title: El producto es bueno
Body: El producto es bueno pero creo que viene con defectos de fábrica porque la tapa no cierra bien, le queda muy floja y fácilmente se sale el líquido.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
Author: Adriana NuñezAdriana Nuñez
Title: ¡Tienen que enviarlo más protegido!
Body: No puedo creer todas las reseñas que este producto tiene con respecto al embalaje. No fui la excepción. Llegó con solo dos pequeñísimos detalles de pintura y me parece que fue debido a la GRAN caja en la que fue depositado y la poca protección que traía por dentro. Es evidente que se venía golpeando durante todo el viaje y tienen que empezar a hacerlo diferente. Fuera de eso, el producto cumple. Sí es bastante grande y al llenarlo por completo con líquido llega a ser bastante pesado y aunque trae asa, hay que sostenerlo con ambas manos (al menos yo). Sin embargo, espero que pueda cumplir mis metas de ingesta diaria de agua y me sea útil para viajes. La verdad sí está precioso en cuanto a color y también está cool el sistema de tapa que trae (aunque si se voltea por completo se va a derramar, no es a prueba de fugas).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2024
Author: julia dukajjulia dukaj
Title: a new family member
Body: if you do not want a kid do not get this thing. a 40 oz jug is the same as a mini baby. carrying it with you everywhere is a motherly duty. “time to feed (refill) her!” “time to wash her!” “she is warm, time to cool (put ice) her!” it is a full responsibility. the only issue is that i have to take off all of the pieces every time i wash it which makes me not want to use it at times. it collects mold if u don’t wash every little piece and i learned that the hard way after finding black, u have to pop out the little pieces and plastic rings on the inside. don’t get sick u guys. i know it’s maybe even a little consumerism. what it truly is though is a personality upgrade. i will gladly chug my stanley along as a part of my identity. thank u

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
Author: kammyyy 🫶🏼kammyyy 🫶🏼
Title: definitely worth it !!!
Body: this is the first review i’ve ever written but i believe it’s well deserved ! to start , it came 3 days earlier than expected !! it was packaged very well && the cup was in perfect condition ! i’ve had it for 3 days now && only replaced the ice maybe twice ! i will say though , it’s definitely not leak proof but i’m not too clumsy so that’s not a problem for me . i’m absolutely OBSESSED wit my stanley ; the looks && function of it !! if you’re debating on whether to purchase this tumblr or not , i would say to definitely go for it !

Also it fits in your car cup holder unlike a lot of other big water bottles. With that being said you can find the same thing for way cheeper. Im just easily influenced🤷🏻‍♀️

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
Author: Nicole C. Nicole C.
Title: Terrible purchase
Body: My daughter purchased this Stanley cup less than two weeks ago on Feb 1st. The paint coating has already started peeling off around the handle. Several areas along the body where the coating is also coming off in what appears to have melted on the top rack in dishwasher; and as you can clearly see it’s marked “dishwasher safe”.  Also has several spots of rust developing along the top. Very disappointed! Saddest part is my 8 yr old daughter saved up her money to buy this junk!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2024
Author: Monica W
Title: I think my Stanley is broken
Body: So I bought a new Stanley because the original Stanley that my son got me from the company I left in an Uber. So I decided to try Amazon to get a replacement and I did. The problem with this Stanley is my ice is melting and my warm beverages get cold after like one hour. I am highly disappointed and I want to know what do I need to do to get a new one?  my advice is to order your Stanley directly from the company. I would have given it one star, but I gave it to stars because I did receive my Stanley in the proper time frame that they promised me on the Amazon website..

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024

Title: A Stanley!
Body: The product came scratched but otherwise as described. The color is beautiful!

Title: The Stanley cup is worth the money!
Body: I really wanted the light pink Stanley tumbler and wasn’t able to find it in stock anywhere. But Amazon had it! I love it! I can leave it in the hot car and it will still have ice in it at the end of the day. It holds 40 ounces of water but is still lightweight and easy to carry around.

Author: Molly
Title: Ice melts <1 hour
Body: I got this as a gift and noticed after a few uses that my ice was melting in less than 1 hour every time I used it. I emailed the company thinking my cup was defective. They sent me another one for free (customer service was great). The new one arrives, I precool it down in the fridge as directed and all my ice still melted in less than an hour. I don’t get the hype at all. Cup is beautiful, but it does NOT keep anything cold. Very disappointed.

Author: Codi B.Codi B.
Title: Quencher
Body: Overall I was excited to get one when they are sold out on the website. It arrived pretty quickly but I do assume it’s from sort of left over or defected stock because it has a couple defects; the soft part of the handle has a large mark on it and the paint job has a couple flaws. For $70 I would think it’d be a little more checked over before shipping but again, I’m pretty easy going and didn’t have high expectations since they’re sold out. Slim pickins 🤷🏼‍♀️PS I have a Quencher as does my husband and my son has a kids cup and they are all perfect with no issues. So I do expect this is just a leftover possibly defective stock pile they had left over

El encargado de llevarlo a domicilio, decidió (por no haberme encontrado en mi domicilio) que era buena idea arrojarlo sobre la reja... evidentemente se dañó (ya en proceso de devolución)...

Con bastante capacidad, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Me encanta!

Author: AIP AxeAIP Axe
Title: Great insulation
Body: Very good looking, urging me to drink enough water every day

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2024
Author: Madeleine
Title: Extremely Disappointing and Overpriced
Body: I was really disappointed with the Stanley Quencher. It's not holding ice at all! I have other, non-name-brand tumblers that perform way better. With this one, my ice is completely gone after just 4-6 hours. On top of that, it leaks and is difficult to drink from if you don't use a straw. Save your money and don't buy this tumbler—it's not worth it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2024
Author: teresa taylor
Title: Stanley cup
Body: Poor quality the handle fell off my cup in less than a month

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
Author: Dissatisfied
Title: Missing  Straw in Stanley cup
Body: Missing straw in Stanley cup. No offer to make it right

Date: Reviewed in Mexico on May 21, 2024
Author: CRISTINA LUJAN
Title: Vino sin el empaque adecuado y golpeado
Body: Es un vaso caro y vino con 2 golpes y unos pequeños rayones

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Author: Ignacio C.
Title: Not worth it
Body: It is a heavy cup and seems sturdy however the Lid doesn't close completely and won't screw on completely straight no mater how many times you try.  My ice melts within a couple of hours and is room temperature.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
Author: Debbie Woolard
Title: Not as sturdy as I thought
Body: I loved the cup but a student accidentally knocked it off the desk and the handle broke off!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
Author: Juliet Mann
Title: DENTED
Body: Its a cute cup, but it came dented and scrached up. It also took awhile to arrive,

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Tips too easily
Body: This cup is so top heavy if it’s not on a completely level surface it will tip over in a second. Even when it’s on a level surface it will tip it if you accidentally bump it or the straw.  It’s so frustrating that you have to ensure it’s steady before you take your hands off of it. It’s also to big to fit in all my cup holders in my vehicles. It is great at keeping beverages cold for an extended period of time but it is so difficult to handle without tipping over I hardly use it as much as I had hoped to

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
Author: Chelle
Title: Stanley Cup
Body: When the Stanley cup arrived it had multiple chips in it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
Author: Kelly LaMar
Title: It’s a Stanley cup
Body: It came with a ding in it. And it was way overpriced but I am that mom and my daughter had to have it. Disappointing that it was dented when I took it out of the box.
